job.title: Software Engineer (Early Startup)
job.description: <p><strong><u>Overview</u></strong></p><p>Looking for a Lead Developer/Software Engineer to help build out our platform and grow our developer team. This position comes with a lot of decision power, responsibility, and control over the technical aspects of our business. Being an early hire and in charge of such a major part of the business, applicants should expect to be treated as and act as a co-founder. Applicants should not only be willing to work in a startup environment, but thrive in one. The best applicants will be able to wear many hats and will be a "jack of all trades" in modern tech development as we build and iterate with various technologies. This position will report directly to the CEO.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Responsibilities</u></strong></p><p>1. Oversee, develop, and code the technical side of the SaidThat platform</p><p>2. (As the team scales) Manage, hire, and build out SaidThat's development team</p><p>3. Build iOS &amp; Android apps along with a corresponding website</p><p>4. Help inform the company on the best technologies and practices to use</p><p>5. Work with designer/agency to implement their design, flow, and layout for the platform</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Requirements</u></strong></p><p>1. A bachelor's degree or higher in computer science</p><p>2. Proficient in Javascript, CSS, &amp; HTML (Previous experience in Node, React, and React Native is a major plus)</p><p>3. Leadership experience</p><p>4. Previous experience developing smartphone applications</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Compensation</u></strong></p><p>The position will be paid at the most competitive salary we can offer given our initial funding. Additionally, applicants that are a good long term fit can also expect to be awarded equity in the company on a traditional vesting cycle.</p>
